name: simple calculator
author: Ronak Dave

sections.description:
Simple Calculator Plugin is a calculator that can be used from the admin panel.This is useful when any user needs calculations to be done when they are on the admin panel as well as this plugin is now working with the front end as well.

Just insert a simple shortcode into your page or posts and you are ready to use this superb calculator.

You will get the results on the same page of the calculator addition, subtraction, multiplication and division all at one place. this is the first release of this plugin and it is really very easy to use just install it and click the scalculator link in the settings and this simple ajax calculator is ready for use.

This Calculator is build for Admin use as well as on the front end use.
Simply use [scalculator] Short code anywhere in the post or page and Simple calculator is ready to use. Unique CSS Class are already defined with the help of which you can design your calculator as per requirement.

We are sure you would like this new enhanced version of our previous plugin. If there is any idea with which this plugin can be more enhanced then you can drop it @ our website. Or else if you want some other plugin to be developed then do let us know we are always ready to built something new ðŸ™‚ .

Thank you for Using Our Plugin,
from Plugin Developer.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload simple-calculator folder after extracting the zip file to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or simply upload the zip file from the admin panel.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to setting -> scalculator, and its ready to go..!
sections.faq:
Do this calculator work for frontend of the website?

Simply use [scalculator] Short code anywhere in the post or page and Simple calculator is ready to use

Widget is available?

Yes the widget is available with this plugin which can be inserted from the widget area.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • This is the first stable release of this plugin

1.1

  • This is the Second Version stable release of this plugin more enhanced
